reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Improving the safety in the feed-dairy chain

description.narrative: The project strengthens Kenya's capacity to improve safety in the feed-dairy chain. In addition it contributes to the improvement of food security through better management practices of feeds and foodstuffs. Activities include training to monitor the dange rs related to foodstuffs and analysis and management of risks as well as the establishment of a reference laboratory. The implementing partners of this Institutional Cooperation Instrument (ICI) Project are MTT Agrifood Research Finland and the University of Nairobi. The project budjet is 587 000 euros in 2010-2013.
